name: 8 Ball Pool Master Championship
description:
This 8 Ball Billiard game is one of the most realistic and playable snooker and pool games available on mobile devices. This game boast up the confidence of the player and this game is the complete package for both beginers and experts.
The game has awesome features and interface.The simple click and play interface allows you to pick up and play the game quickly, or alternatively for the more serious players the game includes awesome features and background colors allowing you to perform more advanced shots.
